President Biden has recently started using a CPAP machine to help deal with his sleep apnea, a common disorder in which one’s breathing is interrupted as one sleeps. The CPAP machine, also known as a continuous positive airway pressure machine, is one of the most widely used treatments for sleep apnea and works by delivering a continuous stream of air into masks worn during sleep, helping to keep breathing passages open and ensuring that people receive the oxygen they need. It is estimated that some 8 million people in the United States use CPAP machines and President Biden has had the condition for more than a decade. The White House official said that the president had begun wearing the CPAP device in recent weeks in an attempt to improve the quality of his sleep.

  1. President Biden has been using a CPAP machine to help treat his sleep apnea.
  2. Sleep apnea is a common disorder in which one’s breathing is interrupted as one sleeps.
  3. CPAP machines are the most widely used treatments for sleep apnea.
  4. Sleep apnea can bring with it a range of consequences such as lack of oxygen, high blood pressure, heart disease and stroke.
  5. President Biden had disclosed his sleep apnea more than a decade ago, but his presidential doctor did not mention the condition in either of the two letters assessing his health in 2021 and 2023.

"It's like a person with a broken leg not wearing a cast - the broken leg will not heal properly and could lead to further complications, even though the treatment is known and available."
